title: Mouse wont shop up in game . Somebody know whats problem. Help please if u know.

replies.body:
Usually something like this occurs when your mouse settings in Windows interacts very oddly with League of Legends.  The[ steps in our Knowledge Base Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#wq1) should be able to get this resolved and have the glorious gloved hand appear once more.

Let me know if you continue to see any issues!
When i start a game mouse just disappear.
